page.title: 04THE WURLITZER ORGAN.
page.content: In Beer there is a{Wurlitzer}organ.It was the first{Wurlitzer}organ that came from the U.S.A.The organ was installed in the Congregational Chapel in 1925.In those days it wore a brass plate that bore the words "Hope Jones Unit Orchestra"which has now worn away. Each year people ask to see and play the organ,a man even comes from Holland just to have a go on the organ.Many famous people have played on it.Really the organ is very small with only two manuals and a pedal- board but it is still a very interes- ting object for organ fanatics.
